column4: Hi guys, need help on cpufreq. Intel E2160 CPU, Ubuntu 6.10 with 2.6.17-10-generic kernel (shipped with ISO), cpufreq seems not working. modprobe either speedstep-centrino or acpi-cpufreq fails with "No such device". Any one has an idea? Thanks.
i don't think edgy is supported any more, which means nothing but security updates i believe. You may have better results with 7.10
I just happened to have that CD so I installed it first... is there a known kernel works with E2160 / cpufreq or I'll have to apt-get upgrade ?
